name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.8g
body: Fixed Locast Fobidden Error on authentication

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.8e
body: Fixed Channel Number adjustments from channel editor and prefix/suffix in settings for M3U and XMLTV.XML outputs.

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.8d
body: Added the abilty to restart cabernet from the website through the scheduler.

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.8c
body:
Added Data Management Page
- updated EPG to be more like zap2xml.  
  - Added new date type for events, 
  - Added actors and directors
  - added subtitle for events
- Made for changes for db locking
  - tested by forcing a epg update, then requesting a xmltv.xml page

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.8b
body:
Added Data Managment page
Also fixed IncompleteRead exception which occurs when locast sends a partial stream.  This exception was not caught and causes TVH to have issues recording.  Stream is retried which fixed issue.

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.8a
body:
Added Data Management page
Fixed a number of issues
- Added episode dd_progid to xmltv.xml file to be more compatible with tvheadend
- Added ability to change episode number by 1000 so tvheadend will record both channels of the same episode
- Resolved some database locking issues
- Updated scheduler to say "Running" while task is in progess
- Fixed streaming issue with ffmpeg
- Added olympics to epg category
- Made is so the scheduler page only refreshes while actively running a task

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.8
body:
Added Data Management
- Adds Backup and Restore of config.ini and database files
- Adds the ability to reset the EPG or Channel databases so that data is forced to refresh
- Adds weekly backups to Scheduler occurring on Sunday at 2:00 AM.  (this can be changed by user)
Changes do not impact data area.  To upgrade, you can just overlay the source area.

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.7d
body: - Graceful shutdown on CTRL-C for scheduler tasks/threads

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.6d
body: Fixed issue when locast login is good, but DMA data is bad.  It will disable the instance when this happens.

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.5 stable
body: Re-tagged the version as a stable release.

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.4o
body:
- Changed log level for an invalid token to warning
- Added code to allow the new token to be used if login authentication succeeded even if the token is invalidated every time the app is restarted

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.3a
body: Updated Windows Installer to fix python checks

name: tvheadend-locast 0.8.2
body:
Fixed numerous Windows installer issues
- Added the ability for the installer to pick a data folder and to use that instead of the protected program files area.
- Updated service to use the config.ini from the new data folder
- Other small fixes associated with the installer

name: tvheadend-locast 0.7.5c
body: Windows python process implementation is significantly different than Linux.  Changes made to make app compatible with Windows and Linux.

name: tvheadend-locast 0.7.2
body: Fixed issue when the EPG has a channel id that is not listed in the stations list from locast.
